feature_name: Roundtable Analysis Agent with Named Personas

test_strategy_covers_unit_integration_e2.notes: Strategy covers: unit tests for readMetaJson/writeMetaJson extensions (20 tests, Suite A), step file YAML validation (28 tests, Suite B), step file inventory validation (10 tests, Suite C), integration tests for meta.json round-trip (5 tests, Suite D), manual E2E scenarios (3 full workflows, Suite E), adaptive depth E2E (4 scenarios, Suite F), persona review checklists (3 reviews, Suite G). Security covered in Section 8. Performance covered in Section 7.

test_cases_exist_for_all_requirements.notes: 63 automated test cases + 10 manual E2E scenarios + 3 persona review checklists covering all 12 FRs, all 6 NFRs, and all 77 acceptance criteria. Agent behavior (FR-001..003, FR-007..008, FR-010..011) covered by manual E2E since markdown agents cannot be unit tested. Testable components (three-verb-utils, step files) have 100% automated coverage.

traceability_matrix_complete.notes: traceability-matrix.csv has 77 rows mapping all 77 ACs to specific test cases. Verified: every AC-NNN-NN in requirements-spec.md has at least one test case row. Zero gaps. 100% requirement coverage.

coverage_targets_defined.notes: Targets: 53+ new automated tests (20 meta.json + 28 step validation + 5 integration), 555 baseline maintained (0 regressions), total 608+. readMetaJson/writeMetaJson new paths: 100% branch coverage. Step frontmatter validation: 100% VR-STEP rule coverage. Mutation score target: >=80%.

test_data_strategy_documented.notes: test-data-plan.md covers: meta.json boundary values (steps_completed types, depth_overrides types), step file boundary values (step_id format, title length, persona/depth enum), invalid inputs (13 meta.json invalid scenarios, 17 step file invalid scenarios), maximum-size inputs (24 steps, 5 depth overrides, 60-char titles), test data generation strategy with inline factory functions.

critical_paths_identified.notes: Critical paths: (1) three-verb-utils.cjs backward compatibility -- 184 existing tests must pass, (2) readMetaJson steps_completed/depth_overrides defaults -- 12 tests, (3) writeMetaJson preservation of new fields -- 8 tests, (4) isdlc.md fallback when roundtable agent absent -- TC-E03, (5) Step file schema validation -- 28 tests.

constitutional_compliance.article_II_test_first: COMPLIANT - 63+ automated test cases designed before implementation per TDD mandate. Coverage targets defined (>=80% unit, 555 baseline maintained). Test pyramid documented.
constitutional_compliance.article_VII_artifact_traceability: COMPLIANT - 77-row traceability matrix with 100% AC coverage, zero orphan tests, zero orphan requirements.
constitutional_compliance.article_IX_quality_gate: COMPLIANT - All GATE-05 checklist items pass. Required artifact (test-strategy.md) exists. All supporting artifacts (test-cases/, traceability-matrix.csv, test-data-plan.md) exist.
constitutional_compliance.article_XI_integration_testing: COMPLIANT - 5 integration tests validate meta.json round-trip behavior. Mutation testing plan with 9 mutations documented. Adversarial testing plan with property-based inputs and boundary analysis documented. Mutation score target >=80%.
